website_summaries.verdict: Asics reissue the Asics Gel Epirus lace-up sneakers from its lineup of classic shoe models from the ‘90s leaving true-blue Asics followers beyond pleased. For some buyers, the Gel Epirus may have flaws like a narrow fit. But just like other Asics shoes, its pros outnumber its cons.  Once broken-in, the level of comfort that the Asics Gel Epirus provides is unparalleled. It flaunts an easy-to-wear aesthetic that evidently gives the nod to its classic roots. Also, it is lightweight and offers excellent support.
pros: Some purchasers commented that the Asics Gel Epirus is lightweight
This Asics shoe is overall comfortable on foot, especially with the right size on, according to lots of reviewers
It is a great everyday shoe
Some buyers said that the Gel Epirus, like most low-top sneakers from Asics, is great looking and stylish
Few wearers commend the top-notch quality of this low-top
Some reviewers said that the Asics Gel Epirus provides excellent support
Many said that this Asics Gel shoe fits true to size in length
Several buyers said that with an affordable price, they consider this shoe a great buy
cons: Some reviewers noted that the Asics Gel Epirus fits too tight and narrow and not for wide-footed wearers
At least one reviewer highlighted that the tongue tends to rub on foot and causes a bit of discomfort

customer_reviews.title: Returned them and looked elsewhere for a shoe I really liked. Ended up not really finding anything and ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pair of these in the size I normally wear for all types of shoes. They were way too tight. Returned them and looked elsewhere for a shoe I really liked. Ended up not really finding anything and ordered these in a size up. Still too tight. They are much more narrow than every other shoe I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Matt White

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, light and great looking sneakers back me to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, light and great looking sneakers back me to the 80-s. My size is 10 and I bought 11 this pair like guys advice.
customer_reviews.author: leonid khaychenko

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look great but run a little narrow through the midfoot.
customer_reviews.author: jimlikesmath

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are true to size, however they do run a little narrow. This is a excellent shoe, very comfortable and light weight.It's a little over priced
customer_reviews.author: Weng Wenqi

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit as expected and definitely look good on your feet
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I was able to find a classic and clean looking shoe without the bright neon colors. I was a little hesitant at first given all of the reviews about the shoe being tight for some people. I don't have a wide foot, so I didn't have any issues. These shoes fit as expected and definitely look good on your feet!
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size up
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable & lite. But they are cut small. I would recommend and size up from your normal size. But nice
customer_reviews.author: Irving Gwynn

customer_reviews.title: On the size chart, It show US10=Europe 44. ...
customer_reviews.text: On the size chart,It show US10=Europe 44.But the truth is,US10=Europe43.My size Europe44, so siechart misled me, leading me to buy a pair of small size of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: freenini

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe! Go true to size, I went a half size down and fits a little snug but they feel real nice on my feet.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and comfortable shoes but little narrow and it generate sound when walking
customer_reviews.text: My size is 10 2E . I ordered 11 and it merely fit. The shoes looks very nice and comfortable. But the only problem is that I always hear "pop pop" sound from the shoes when I walk.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, great shoes for this price. but fells a bit narrow for me.
